definition: of dark brownish to purplish red, an exploding firework used as a warning signal, leave stranded on a desert island without resources
details:
adjective
- of dark brownish to purplish red
= synonyms: brownish-red
noun
- an exploding firework used as a warning signal
- a dark purplish-red to dark brownish-red color
- a person who is stranded (as on an island)
= example: a person who is stranded (as on an island)
verb
- leave stranded on a desert island without resources
= example: leave stranded on a desert island without resources
- leave stranded or isolated with little hope of rescue
= example: leave stranded or isolated with little hope of rescue
= synonyms: strand
